## 🎯 Type of Change
- [ ] 🐛 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)

- [ ] 🧪 Test addition or update
- [ ] 🔒 Security improvement

## 🧪 Testing

- [ ] No breaking changes introduced

- [ ] Screenshots added (for UI changes)
